attributes.action: Return the Elgin Marbles to the New Acropolis Museum, Athens, Greece
attributes.additional_details:
The New Acropolis Museum is a fit and proper place for the original Parthenon marbles. They can be swapped for the replica casts on display at that museum.
An online petition is particularly apt as a democratic method for determining the return of its most important heritage to the country where democracy originated.
The return of the marbles would give a boost to tourism for Greece at a time when it needs all the additional income it can earn.
